subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re:
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I was on one investigation with about 8 others where I had both a digital
audio recorder and a video recorder going. I got the same EVP on both
machines. Other people next to me did not get them. In other cases they got
EVP and I, a couple feet away, got nothing on either machine. That was
fascinating to me.

Zack


On Tue, Nov 9, 2010 at 9:09 AM, Rick Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@...> wrote:

>
>
> I've been into the Paranormal for 33 years,and I agree about picking up
> different evps off multi digital recorders on a investigation,we even pick
> up responses off camcorders and not on recordesr.When using FB boxes # 77-#
> 80 we always use digital recorders/cams...We always get evps and recordings
> with out any of the FB boxes...When using the boxes brings a whole new
> aspect to responses.I have more luck on FM sweep,but the responses I get are
> just too unreal.Had a friend over a couple weeks ago and he "Didn't believe"
> in anything in this field,I asked the Q: Whats Al doing tomorrow? Answer:
> going home..Next Q: hows he getting there? Answer: Flying on plane.......I
> have asked the Q..Are you from past present or future amd get some wild
> answers......
>
>  
>

I was on one in es iga ion wi h abou 8 o he s whe e I had bo h a digi al audio eco de and a ideo eco de going. I go he same EVP on bo h machines. O he people nex o me did no ge hem. In o he cases hey go EVP and I, a couple ee away, go no hing on ei he machine. Tha was ascina ing o me.
